summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2002 HONDA CRV. THE CONTACT STARTED THE VEHICLE AND THE SUPPLEMENTAL RESTRAINT SYSTEM WARNING LIGHT ILLUMINATED ON THE DASHBOARD AND REMAINED ILLUMINATED. IN ADDITION, THE FRONT DRIVER AND PASSENGER SEAT BELTS WILL NOT LATCH. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT TAKEN TO THE DEALER OR A LOCAL MECHANIC FOR THE FAILURE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT SHE WAS AFRAID TO OPERATE THE VEHICLE.  THE FAILURE AND CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 79,929.
